Name: Italian Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice & cherry on stick (sail).
Review: Perhaps a little too many powerful Italian flavours for one drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Italian Sour contains 132 calories
